scripts.bundle:android: yarn react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform android --dev false --bundle-output ./android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle
scripts.bundle:ios: yarn react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ./ios/bundle/main.jsbundle
scripts.build:android: yarn bundle:android && cd android && ./gradlew clean --stacktrace && ./gradlew assembleRelease -x bundleReleaseJsAndAssets --stacktrace
